thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 02 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-OTP eyes two new countries for acquisitions, sees problems in Romania - CEO

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-OTP eyes two new countries for acquisitions, sees problems in Romania - CEO
text:
March 2 (Reuters) - OTP Bank CEO Sandor Csanyi tells press conference:
* ACQUISITIONS ARE A PRIORITY OVER DIVIDEND, IF A SUITABLE TARGET PRESENTED ITSELF OTP WOULD EVEN RAISE CAPITAL TO ACQUIRE, BUT NO SUCH TARGET EVIDENT NOW
* SEES PROBLEMS AROUND 2017 ACQUISITION OF ROMANIAN BANCA ROMANEASCA, REGULATORY APPROVAL PENDING FOR A LONG TIME, WE HAVE“BAD FEELINGS” ABOUT OUTCOME
* OTP HAS TWO NEW EUROPEAN COUNTRIES“IN FOCUS” WHERE IT MAY ACQUIRE WHERE IT IS NOT YET PRESENT, ONE IS“A LITTLE MORE THAN IN FOCUS” - CEO Further company coverage: (Reporting by Marton Dunai)
